params.admin: Address that controls this token (typically the offering diamond)
params.issuer: Address of the company issuing the SAFE (entity wallet for legal purposes)
params.paymentToken: Token used for payment (address(0) for ETH)

convert(uint256).details: Burns the SAFE NFT and mints equity tokens

params.pricePerShare: Price per share in the equity round

isTransferable().details: Override in TokenERC721Facet._transfer to check this

packedSelectors().details: Each selector is 4 bytes, packed sequentially with no padding      MUST NOT include packedSelectors() itself in the returned selectors      MUST be a pure function (no state access)

params.equityToken: Address of the ShareClass token to convert to

SAFE_TOKEN_ID().notice: The single NFT token ID for bilateral SAFE

activate(bytes32).notice: Activate the SAFE after agreement is signed

isConverted().notice: Check if SAFE has been converted

packedSelectors().notice: Returns all function selectors for this facet as tightly packed bytes

previewConversion(uint256).notice: Preview conversion at a given price

setTargetEquityToken(address).notice: Set target equity token for conversion
